column1: M.Sc. New Mobility - Micromobility in Stade
column5:
New Mobility - Micromobility
             

              Master of Science (M.Sc.)
             

              For you, deciding between car, bus or train is ancient history? Are you interested in sustainable ways of getting around? The
              
               Master's study programme New Mobility - Micromibility
              
              provides a study programme in a growing and future-oriented subject area.
column7: Tuition fee: 900.- Euro Tuition monthly One-time fees: One-time fees: 520 EUR admin fee (waived for EU citizens) 420 EUR enrolment fee 1,000 EUR examination fee
